CustomField.description: Displays to users whether this employment record is visible to the customer in the profile.
CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK( OW_latest_update__c ), "ERROR: no update linked", IF( ISPICKVAL( OW_latest_update__r.Deleted_By__c, "" ), "Visible", "Hidden" ))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Tells you whether this employment is visible to the customer in the profile.
CustomField.label: Profile visibility
